verbs.description: Carter Page , 46 , [V: has] been at the center of ongoing investigations into Russian meddling and collusion with the Trump campaign in 2016 because of his alleged ties to Russian officials .

[ARG1: Carter Page , 46 ,] has [V: been] [ARG2: at the center of ongoing investigations into Russian meddling and collusion with the Trump campaign in 2016] [ARGM-CAU: because of his alleged ties to Russian officials] .
Carter Page , 46 , has been at the center of ongoing investigations into Russian meddling and collusion with the Trump campaign in 2016 because of his [V: alleged] [ARG1: ties to Russian officials] .
